somewhat unusual nowadays for one to comment on a good or a service unless the comment is in the form of a complaint but I have to veer from what perhaps is the norm to say Great newsletter I find the format and the information to be concise incisive and of a great benefit in digesting the days market action Plus the letter contains informative relevant news which is not all that available All in all you do an outstanding job in disseminating information which I find to be invaluable for my investment strategy Keep up the good job Jim Freyer I am delighted to have the opportunity to tell you
